price: «ዩሱፍን ግደሉ፡፡ ወይም በ(ሩቅ) ምድር ላይ ጣሉት፡፡ ያባታችሁ ፊት ለእናንተ የግል ይኾናልና፡፡ ከእርሱም በኋላ መልካም ሕዝቦች ትሆናላችሁና» (ተባባሉ)፡፡
arabic: ٱقۡتُلُواْ يُوسُفَ أَوِ ٱطۡرَحُوهُ أَرۡضٗا يَخۡلُ لَكُمۡ وَجۡهُ أَبِيكُمۡ وَتَكُونُواْ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِۦ قَوۡمٗا صَٰلِحِينَ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: uq'tulū yūsufa awi iṭ'raḥūhu arḍan yakhlu lakum wajhu abīkum watakūnū min baʿdihi qawman ṣāliḥīna
